WP.index_10: Are you sure to delete this plugin?
WP.index_11: Are you sure to delete this theme?
WP.index_12: At least 1 theme is active, activate another theme before disable it

Add.Title: Add site - Support batch site building
Add.Tips: Versions 5.6.0+ automatically turn on automatic version updates
Add.CacheNginx: Enable caching, currently only supports nginx
Add.import_5: Subdirectory, blank in the root directory

Migrate.Title: Migrate Site
Migrate.content: About to migrate sites, are you sure you want to continue

Tips.1: After the migration you will be able to manage your wordpress sites in WP Toolkit, but you will not be able to continue to manage your wordpress sites in [Website]!
Tips.2: There are no wordpress that can be migrated from the Website
Tips.4: * Unable to restore wordpress website to [Website] after migration

Integrity.Title: Check WordPress Integrity
Integrity.index_1: If you suspect that this site is infected by malware, check the integrity of WordPress corefiles by verifying them against their reference checksums from wordpress.org.
Integrity.index_4: This will reinstall the WordPress core files without losing site content. It is recommended that you back up your website before reinstalling.
Integrity.index_5: If checksums fail to match, you can quickly reinstall WordPress core files without affecting your site content.

RedirectionTips.0: Protect your website by changing the login URL and preventing access to the wp-login.php page and the wp-admin directory to non-connected people.
RedirectionTips.1: Redirect URL when someone tries to access the wp-login.php page and the wp-admin directory while not logged in.

clone.index_9: Empty clone path means clone in the root directory

Transition.index_6: More features are under development, looking forward to your feedback
